messages.body: $TSLA U.S. creates 211,000 jobs in April as hiring rebounds Unemployment rate drops to 4.4%, lowest since mid-2007  http://on.mktw.net/2qLviMO

links.title: U.S. creates 211,000 jobs in April as hiring rebounds
links.description: By WASHINGTON (MarketWatch) - Some 211,000 people found new jobs in April as hiring rebounded from a wobbly showing in early spring, offering fresh evidence the U.S. economy is still growing at healthy pace after a slow start to the year. The unemployment rate, meanwhile, dipped to 4.4% from 4.5% to set a postrecession low.

links.title: Tesla's Elon Musk Could Kick Back and Chill While Watching Sales Plunges at Ford and General Motors
links.description: It's all smiles for Tesla's ( TSLA) Elon Musk, but maybe not for some of his peers in the auto sector. Auto sales are projected to have slid in April, which will mark four straight months of declines, affecting nearly every major automaker except probably Tesla.

http://ooc.bz/l/11942

links.title: Tesla says its Model 3 reservations are increasing every week - but overall deposits are decreasing
links.description: After proudly announcing reservation numbers for the Tesla Model 3 as the "biggest product launch of all-time", Tesla has refused to officially update the number of reservations since May 2016. They refused to confirm the number again this week during the first quarter financial result call, but CEO Elon Musk did say that reservations were growing every week despite the fact that Tesla's total customer deposits were down.

links.title: Tesla Has a Lot More In Store Than the Model 3
links.description: After Tesla Inc. reported earnings on Wednesday, Elon Musk cracked open the lid on his box of secrets. messages.body: $AAPL $NFLX $TSLA http://www.newsweek.com/twenty-five-years-later-people-still-wont-stop-faking-orgasms-katzs-deli-258596

links.title: A Trip to Katz's, 25 Years After 'When Harry Met Sally'
links.description: Twenty-five years after Meg Ryan faked cinema's most famous orgasm in Katz's Deli, customers still follow her lead in the 126-year-old Lower East Side establishment. Sexually charged gasps and moans fill the deli "at least a couple times a month," says co-owner Fred Austin, who's in the process of transferring management to his nephew Jake Dell.
